chapters.title: Chapter 19: The Wavedancer
chapters.info: Jorin din Jubai White Wing, p. 311 (274)—Sister to Coine, and Windfinder of Wavedancer. She is one of the Windfinders among the Sea Folk who can channel the One Power; she can handle extremely thick flows of Air. Elayne became good friends with her while on her ship, and the two learned a lot from each other. See also din Jubai Wild Winds, Coine.
